adDetails: Certified BMW Tech Professional. Thirty six years experience with local BMW dealership. Owned BMW service and repair shops in both California and Utah. Suspension upgrades, performance modifications or standard services availabls. Gearbox or differential noisy ? Currently with engineering shop at Infinion Raceway maintaining BMW race cars! I have openings in my schedule for additional work. If you want reasonably priced, reliable, on-going service by a talented technician, contact me to discuss your BMW service needs at show contact info... By the way, there is an old saying, "speed costs money, how fast do you wanna to go?"
